RE The End of the year ReviewIn an effort to remain up to date with your goals and expectations for your investment portfolio we recommend an annual meeting This will give us the chance to catch up on changes in your life review your asset allocation the current market conditions and any possible changes in income and estate tax laws Since we are entering the last quarter of we feel it is time to conduct your review Please review the attached document to begin the process for your review Simply complete the form and return to us via fax mail or email Many of our clients are located out of state we will conduct your review over the phone If you do not feel it is necessary to review your financial plan at this time please complete the top half of the attachment and return it to update our records As always we appreciate the confidence you place in us and we hope to work with you toward your financial success for many years to come We look forward to meeting with you soon Sincerely Stephen M Benotti Financial Consultant Emery Financial Group Direct Fax Docdoc

RE Invitation for a WorkshopI have attached an invitation for you or someone you know that may have interest This workshop is located in Houston TX at the Houston Center Auditorium on P Level If you have any questions please give us a call Sincerely Kenneth L Logsdon Stephen MBenotti Don Bosse and David Raack Stephen M Benotti Financial Consultant Emery Financial Group Direct Fax Invitatidoc

RE A Report on the EnronDyengy deal by CSFBAttached is the Latest report on the EnronDyengy deal from CS First Boston Research Please feel free to contact us if there is anything we can help you with This research has been provided to First Union Securities through an arranged relationship with Credit Suisse First Boston CSFB Any questions should be directed through your First Union Securities Financial Consultant Any contact of a CS First Boston analyst or any other CS Fist Boston representative is strictly prohibited THIS FIRST CALL NOTE MUST BE SHOWN IN ITS ENTIRETY INCLUDING ALL DISCLAIMERS CREDIT SUISSE FIRST BOSTON CORPORATION Equity Research Americas Gas Utilities Curt Launer Philip Salles Andy DeVries STRONG BUY Target Price US Dynegy Inc DYN ENE Deal Shows Risk Coverage Est Valuation Upside Summary After the close on Friday DYN confirmed that it would acquire Enron ENE Strong Buy for DYN shares plus assumption of debt and an equity infusion of billion This values ENE at per share based on DYNs Friday close Our initial analyses show the merger to be additive to proforma eps for DYN by to vs our current estimate of We estimate the deal multiples as about x eps x cash flow x book value and x EVEBITDA based on our revised estimates for ENE We would note that DYN has projected a proforma of per share before cost savings and synergies We expect the deal to close in months pending reviews by the SEC FTC FERC and state PSCs Despite the size of the combined company we do not expect major divestitures or closing issues because of the lack of asset concentration and the inherent competitiveness of the natural gas and power marketing business In a report dated Nov we valued ENE at per share In our view the deal valuation includes a differential of per share or billion to account for ENEs related party and accounting issues Because these issues threatened ENEs core businesses the timing and valuation of the deal for DYN is extraordinarily attractive We consider alternate bids for ENE to be possible under these circumstances We expect DYN and other energy merchants to benefit from the removal of risk that ENE would be downgraded below investment grade or file for bankruptcy protection Pending additional information from conference calls analyst meetings and other deal related filings we are maintaining our reported eps ests for DYN of for and for Our ENE ests are for and for These estimates assume the deal closes in Q Price Target Mkt Value Week Nov Months Div Yield m Price Range Annual Prev Abs Rel EBIDAX EV EPS EPS PEx PE m EBIDAXx E E A Q Q Q Q E E A ROGICA Net debtA m Net debtTotal capA Book valueshareA Number of Sharesm On the SP index closed at Economic profit trend Dynegy is a wholesale and retail energy provider with operations in natural gas natural gas liquids coal and electricity throughout the US and Europe Viewpoint Continued We maintain our Strong Buy rating for DYN with a target price of We anticipate growth rate and valuation benefits for DYN that will result in increasing our estimates and target price as the deal moves closer to closing DYN will hold a conference call on Monday November at am EST The call in RE Thanksgiving WeekKen Logsdon Don Bosse David Raack and My Self wanted to wish you and your family a very safe and enjoyable Thanksgiving For your convenience I wanted to give the Market Hours for the rest of the week Today and Wednesday regular hours am pm central on Thursday the markets are closed Friday the NYSE and other markets closed at Noon and our office will officially be closed at pm Once again Have a very enjoyable Thanksgiving with your loved ones and please give us a call with any questions Take Care Take Stephen M Benotti Financial Consultant Emery Financial Group Direct Fax

RE On Line Access to View Your AccountPST First Union has changed the online enrollment process All you need to do is to go to wwwfirstunionseccom click on the Enroll for access online You will then be required to call They will set you up with pin numbers etc You only need to call if you are not online or you need to add an account for you to view If you prefer we can do a conference call with First Union to set up the account Please give us a call with any questions The process should take approx minutes Take Care and Have a good week Stephen M Benotti Financial Consultant Emery Financial Group Direct Fax
